Text: Grrrr...

...Still not yet?! I'm tired of waiting! I never wait
this long for my prey during my usual hunting!

Really? You don't ever try to track your prey's
movements?

I'm not like a pussy cat! There's no point in
tracking them because I'll hunt all of them
down anyway!

Lady Alpha said that's why you sometimes miss
your targets...
Urk!

She said you also sometimes don't check if you've
finished them off, so you're met with unexpected
counterattacksâ€”
Maybe so! But it's got nothing to do with you, Beta!

For starters, you're always using a bow! We'd never
catch any prey if I didn't chase them down!

Well...um...I don't mind so much if it's someone
attacking me...

But I'm still not a big fan of hunting animals simply
living their lives in the wild.

Whaaa?! Keep that up, and you'll end up dying
of hunger!

Even elves hunt just like therianthropes do,
so what's your excuse?

Do you not know how? Did you survive off nuts and
veggies before meeting Boss man?
*sigh*

(...Easy, easy now, Beta. This duo is all part of
Gamma's plan.)

(We will use the full extent of Delta's violence to
hit the decoy unit prepared by the Cult, which is
separate from their main convoy for the possessed.)

(The objective is to instill fear in them toward
the Garden by completely overrunning the traps
designed by the Cult, as well as the Templars...)
Awooo... Not yet? Still not yet?
"Stay" until the Templars attack the Cult's convoy.

The only ones allowed to tell me to "stay" are Boss
man and Lady Alpha! You're weak, Beta, so you don't
get to tell me to "stay"!
Urrrk!

(And...most important of all is keeping Delta from
ruining the plan by attacking the main convoy with
unnecessary strength.)

(So, instead of having her deal with the main
convoy, we've rerouted her to a different
battlefield... This is also part of Gamma's plan.)

...I'm sure the strategy is sound! But I'm the one
who suffers as a result!

Shhh! Beta! Quit barking! If you're being loud like
that before we even hunt them, they'll hear us!
U-Urrk!

It's really basic stuff, Beta! You seriously are
a terrible hunter.
(Easy...keep your cool, Beta!)
...They're on the move! Get ready, Delta!
Grrrr!

I'll stir chaos as soon as they engage in battle by
discreetly firing arrows at them.

Once you see that the Cult members and Templars are
disoriented and in disarray, you can start huntingâ€”

Damn it... We got the short end of the stick having
to take on this lot!
Chhhh...kuhhh...
You damn...fanatics!

Hold back their offensive! We'll buy as much time
as we can!
It's time... Let's go!

By striking a few of them from their blind spot while
being careful not to kill them...

Both the Cult and the Templars will think the other
is launching an ambush, and the battle will descend
further into chaos... Take this!
Aaaaaghhh!!!
Huh?! An arrow?!
(Wha...what?!)

That wasn't one of us... Where did it come from?!
Keep a lookout on the surrounding area while we
deal with the Templars!
(Oh no! Did I just mess everything up?!)

(I purposely aimed to miss their vitals to
stoke further confusion between the Cult
and the Templars!)

(What was I thinking, taking one of them out with a
single shot? It's only made them more cautious!)

Oh-woof! You took that one out with a single
shot! You've gotten a little stronger and better
at hunting, Beta!
If I can't control my aim, I'm just as bad as Delta!

Hm? I remember Lady Alpha told me to fight the way
you fight, so...

Guess that means I should mercilessly hunt down
every one just like you, Beta!

How did you reach that conclusion?! It's not like
that! It's noooot!

It is like that! Now that you're hunting, I can't
wait any longer!
Gaaaaaahhh!!!
*gasp* An ambush?!
My prey! You're not going anywhere!
Gyaahhhh!!!
Grrrr... I'll hunt down each and every one of you!

Aaaah! We were supposed to proceed in an orderly
fashion!
Delta, you... No, this is all my fault!
